keyMoments.title: Caribou's Debut
keyMoments.description: Caribou makes his first appearance alongside his brother Coribou, attacking a Marine spy with a spear. They are shown to be ruthless killers with high bounties.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a major antagonist for the upcoming Fish-Man Island arc and establishes his dangerous nature.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Recruited by Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Caribou and his brother are recruited by the Fake Straw Hat crew at Grove 46, believing they're joining the real Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the Straw Hat name can attract powerful pirates, even through imposters.

bounties.reason: Notorious rookie pirate known for killing Marines

relationships.description: Caribou and Coribou are brothers who co-captain the Caribou Pirates together.

evolutionMoments.description: The brothers are shown working together to kill a Marine spy.

reveals.information: Co-captain of the Caribou Pirates with his brother Coribou

keyMoments.title: Coribou's Debut
keyMoments.description: Coribou appears with his brother Caribou, helping to kill a Marine spy and preparing to bury the body.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Coribou as Caribou's partner in crime and shows their brutal methods.
keyMoments.quote: Let's give this Marine a proper burial at sea.

bounties.reason: Notorious rookie pirate known for killing Marines

relationships.description: Coribou and Caribou are brothers who co-captain the Caribou Pirates together.

evolutionMoments.description: The brothers work together to eliminate a Marine spy.

reveals.information: Co-captain of the Caribou Pirates with his brother Caribou

keyMoments.title: Albion's Debut
keyMoments.description: Albion, a rookie pirate with a bounty of 92 million berries, is recruited by the Fake Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the caliber of pirates being attracted to the Straw Hat name.

keyMoments.title: Lip Doughty's Debut
keyMoments.description: Lip Doughty, a rookie pirate with a bounty of 88 million berries, is recruited by the Fake Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the powerful pirates being attracted to the Straw Hat reputation.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Mistakes Fake Crew
keyMoments.description: Chopper mistakenly approaches the Fake Straw Hat Pirates, believing they are his real crewmates, showing how much the crew's appearance has changed.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the dramatic transformation of the Straw Hats after the timeskip.
keyMoments.quote: Zoro! Sanji! Robin! I finally found you!

keyMoments.title: Chopper Defends Crew Values
keyMoments.description: Chopper becomes angry when Fake Luffy abandons a crewmate and decides to rescue her himself.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's unwavering loyalty and the core values of the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.quote: How can you just abandon your own crewmate?! I'll save Robin myself!

keyMoments.title: Chopper Reunites with Nami and Usopp
keyMoments.description: Chopper finds and reunites with the real Nami and Usopp, marking his first encounter with his transformed crewmates.
keyMoments.significance: Important reunion moment showing the Straw Hats coming back together after two years.

reveals.information: Chopper's appearance has changed enough that he can't recognize his crewmates, and they've changed so much he mistakes imposters for them

keyMoments.title: Robin Arrives at Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Robin arrives at the Thousand Sunny and reunites with Franky, discussing the ship's coating and their upcoming journey.
keyMoments.significance: Marks an important reunion and shows preparations for the New World journey.

keyMoments.title: Franky Reunites with Robin
keyMoments.description: Franky meets Robin at the Thousand Sunny, showing off his new cyborg upgrades and explaining the ship's coating.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Franky's post-timeskip modifications and ship preparations.
keyMoments.quote: The ship is fully coated and ready for the journey to the New World.

keyMoments.title: Franky's Post-Timeskip Upgrades
keyMoments.description: Franky displays his enhanced cyborg body with new modifications gained on Vegapunk's island.
keyMoments.significance: First glimpse of Franky's technological improvements from the timeskip.

reveals.information: Franky has received significant cyborg upgrades during the timeskip
